transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, haan ji, hi, good morning.
Customer: Avinash ji baat kar rahe hai ya Naveen ji?
Executive: Sorry, hi sir.
Customer: Aapki voice nahi aa rahi thi, bataiye sir, hi, good morning.
Executive: Good morning, aap Naveen ji baat kar rahe hai na?
Customer: Haan, aap kaun se baat kar rahe hai sir?
Customer: Vasant steel Salim baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Vasant steel Salim baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Vasant steel, achha, okay, hi sir, hi, good morning, good morning.
Customer: Ji sir.
Customer: Kya, kya phir process shuru hua, wohi puchna tha.
Executive: Ji sir, aapke liye kal maine sara apna pending kaam kar diya tha jo mujhe karna hai aapki service stop karane ke liye. Ek approval reh gaya hai sir jo aaj most probably mil jayega aur jahan tak hai sir main aaj aapki services close kara dunga.
Customer: Nahi, pehle maine yeh pucha tha ki meri kitni amount aapne nikali hai bakaya, woh pehle mujhe bataiye. Haan. Uske baad aapko karna hai kyunki phir main accept nahi karunga ki agar woh sahi nahi hai toh.
Executive: Sir, aapko maine bataya tha jo prorata basis pe amount ban raha hai woh bhi account team aapko share karti hai jitna service aapki use hui hai na sir, uske base pe refund amount banta hai. To woh, woh account team share karegi hume aur jaise hi aata hai sir main aapko bhejta hu. Mere paas calculation jo aayi hai sir main waise aapko WhatsApp kar deta hu aap chahe toh usko dekh sakte hai sir.
Customer: Haan, kar dijiye main dekh leta hu ek baar.
Executive: Theek hai, main, main bhejta hu sir aap.
Customer: Theek hai, kya hai ki main bhi mila lu ke barabar hai ya nahi sahi galat hai.
Executive: Haan, aap dekh lijiye sir, total jo refund amount ban raha hai sir woh ₹10,803 ban raha hai. Jisme ₹10,803 ban raha hai sir.
Customer: Kyun, kyun?
Executive: Sir, refund amount aapki service duration ke base pe banta hai jab tak aapki service abhi chalni bachi hai. Total, yeh calculate jo hota hai woh annual base pe hota hai sir. Aap jab deal karte hai na koi bhi IndiaMART ke saath teen saal ki jab uska refund banta hai toh woh annual base pe refund kiya jata hai sir. Kyunki annual base ka matlab?
Customer: Annual base ka matlab?
Executive: Annual base ka matlab yeh hota hai sir jaise maximizer ho gaya toh maximizer ke jo annual cost hoti hai ek saal ki woh ₹70,000 plus GST ki hoti hai, theek hai? Aur agar hum teen saal dete hai aapko toh woh ₹1,30,000 mein pad jata hai. Matlab ek saal company kya karti hai free samajh ke ya add karke deti hai sir uski price mein. Toh jab refund banta hai sir toh refund jo nikala jata hai woh aapke annual rate ke base pe nikala jata hai services ki. Toh uske hisab se aap, aap, aap mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Toh uske hisab se aap, aap, aap mujhe bataiye.
Executive: Bataiye.
Customer: Jo paisa maine diya hai, woh maine jitne time ke liye use kiya usko 36 mahine se hi mangna padega. Varna main woh accept nahi karunga. Matlab jo bhi hai, ka jo, yeh, yeh, yeh, yeh aapka calculation galat hai. Agar woh is tarah se karte hai.
Executive: Main aapko bhej de raha hu ek baar aap padh lijiye usme saari cheeze likhi hai.
Customer: Bhale hi likhi ho, main yeh galat calculation ko accept nahi karunga.
Executive: Sir, ek baar aap calculation padh lijiye pehle, uske baad baat karte hai, main aapko bhejta hu WhatsApp pe.
Customer: Haan, bhej dijiye. Usme saari cheeze likhi hui hai, ek baar padh lijiye aap pehle. Theek hai woh, yeh, yeh agar aap, haan, galat calculation aapko, aapko hi. Nahi, yeh, yeh, yeh jo refund banta hai na sir woh saare customer ke liye same hai sir. Pehle mujhe aap yeh bataiye ki refund, refund ka jo process matlab hai, uska mujhe aap writing mein dijiye ki kis tarah se aap refund karte hai. Hai na? Aapke jo rules, rules banaye hai woh mujhe aap bhej dijiye main dekh leta hu ek baar.
Executive: Sir, jo last proposal aapne IndiaMART ke saath jab proposal aapne use kiya tha na uske terms and condition mein yeh likha hua hai jab refund hota hai toh woh annual base ke rate pe hota hai woh aap padhenge aathwa number pe aata hai sir shayad usme likha hua hai sir terms and condition mein. Baaki main calculation aapko WhatsApp kar de raha hu ek baar padh lijiye aap.
Customer: Aur jo aapne mujhe package diya tha woh bhi, woh bhi pura bhej dijiye taki main usko bhi study kar lu.
Executive: Theek hai sir, dono bhej de raha hu terms and condition bhi aap padh lijiyega sir usme likha hua hai.
Customer: Haan, woh sab bhej dijiye main ek baar dekh leta hu phir aapko batata hu.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai done.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know the exact refund amount.

- Disagrees with the refund calculation method.

- Requests refund process in writing.



Resolution:

- Executive explained refund calculation based on annual rate.

- Agreed to send the refund calculation on WhatsApp.

- Agreed to send the package details and terms.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will review the documents and revert.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, calculation, terms
